name: Planted (Jess Andz, viniciuslezo)
description:
Water dripping from the echoey ceiling of a cave. You hear nothing but the buzzes of flies in your ear.  You're probably tired of being here, don't know if there's a better place out there but at the very least it'll be different from this stickyness you've grown to know. 

CREDITS

Jess Andz: game design, programmer and artist. 

Vinicius "Lezo": composer.

Bruno Pietra: composer (main menu theme, lake theme) and sound effects. 

Pablo Chamber: game design and team recruiter. 

ADITIONAL CREDITS

Birds In Spring (Scotland) track: BurghRecords.

Made in 5 days for My First Game Jam 2022!! (we started the jam late *cries*). It's more of a prototype than anything. 

(This game contains mentions or deals with the subject of psychological abuse).
